snippet.title: Screenbound - Official Gameplay Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description: Screenbound is a game about being distracted, but totally in control. Check out the latest Screenbound trailer to see gameplay from this upcoming "5D" platformer game, where you move in first-person view in a 3D world at the same time while playing in 2D on the screen of your Qboy (an in-game Game Boy-like device). Screenbound will be available on PC.
